title: Panel Sync Fixes Verified in v1.6.2.x
details:
The Quick Tabs Manager Panel synchronization fixes documented in manager-panel-sync-diagnostic.md were already implemented in the codebase:

**Fix 1: Track State Changes While Panel is Closed**
- File: src/features/quick-tabs/panel/PanelContentManager.js
- stateChangedWhileClosed flag in constructor (line 53)
- setIsOpen() checks flag and updates content on open (lines 62-72)
- All state handlers set flag when panel closed (lines 417-489)

**Fix 2: storage.onChanged Listener for Cross-Tab Sync**
- File: src/features/quick-tabs/panel/PanelContentManager.js
- Listener in setupEventListeners() (lines 379-397)
- Cleanup in destroy() (lines 753-757)

**Fix 3: Remove Race Condition in Button Actions**
- File: src/features/quick-tabs/panel/PanelContentManager.js
- _handleQuickTabAction() no longer uses setTimeout (lines 510-534)

**Fix 4: Panel.open() Always Updates Content**
- File: src/features/quick-tabs/panel.js
- open() calls setIsOpen(true) AND updateContent() (lines 242-243)

All 2150 unit tests pass, ESLint clean, build succeeds.
